name: OPTION 1 - Basic Gallery Listing Package
description: This is the cheapest and most direct way to market yourself to your ideal client and keep your phone ringing. Your photo will be featured in KHARMA NY gallery, which is visited by more than 1000 screened & verified upscale clients per week, many of whom are outcalls. Clients will have a chance to view your photos, services offered and to contact you directly.  You set your own rates and keep 100% of your profits. 1 photo per profile. Your gallery listing expires after 6 months. Should you need booking & promotional assistance, you can always add the One-Day package.

name: OPTION 2 - One-Month Package
description: This package is perfect for bodyrub specialists who want to maintain their privacy and not deal with the hassle of time-wasters or high agency fees. Your photo will be featured in KHARMA NY gallery, which is visited by more than 1000 screened & verified upscale clientèle per week, and you will begin receiving bookings immediately. This package allows you 1 photo with your profile and an active one-month listing. Your photo will be available only to screened clients AFTER they book your first massage.  This rate also includes 8 FREE premium advertisements on top online classified sites.

name: OPTION 3 - Two-Month Premium Package
description: SAVE $150 INSTANTLY! This package is perfect for bodyrub specialists who want to maintain their privacy and not deal with the hassle of time-wasters or high agency fees. Your photo will be featured in KHARMA NY gallery, which is visited by more than 1000 screened & verified upscale clientèle per week, and you will begin receiving bookings immediately.  This package you allows you up to 3 photos with your profile and an active 2 month listing. Your profile will also be featured for 2 weeks on KHARMA NY's homepage, getting you more client bookings.  This rate also includes 20 FREE premium advertisements on top online classified sites.

name: OPTION 4 - Six-Month Platinum Package
description: SAVE $500! This package is perfect for bodyrub specialists who want to maintain their privacy and not deal with the hassle of time-wasters or high agency fees. Your photo will be featured on the frontpage of KHARMA NY's website, which is visited by more than 1000 screened & verified upscale clientèle per week, and you will begin receiving bookings immediately.   One of our trained receptionist/bookers will post your online advertising daily, screen your calls and divert all direct & indirect bookings to you, as per your desired schedule for FREE. This package includes 100 FREE premium postings on top online classified advertisement sites! You get your personal virtual booker and get to keep 100% of your earnings. No agency fees!

name: OPTION 5 - One-Day Personal Booker
description: Are you a busy lady on the go? Try our one-day booking service. We answer phones and sort through client requests so you can focus on making money. Allow one of our trained receptionist/bookers to post your online advertising, screen your calls and divert all bookings for you for one whole day. This package is perfect for bodyrub specialists who want to maintain their privacy and not deal with the hassle of time-wasters, high agency fees, or long-term commitments. You get your personal virtual booker and get to keep 100% of your earnings. This rate is per day and inclusive of advertising fees on KHARMA NY and 2 posts on top online classified sites.
